name: Nexia Digital
tagline: Creating awesome digital products for web & mobile
description:
We help companies thrive in a digital world by using design and technology to create experiences people love. We believe in innovation through iteration and collaboration with our clients and users, because products are the living expression of the brands we build. 
Our expertise includes UI Design, Mobile and Web Applications. We move fluidly with the trends, and introduce concepts that are fresh and accessible. We pride ourselves in our ability to look ahead to identify, generate and leverage the latest and greatest in the ever changing digital landscape.
Our creative designers and developers are equipped to take on the challenges in the areas of mobile application development, ecommerce solutions, custom web development, Content Mangement Systems and creating unique brand designs.
On the technolgy front, we work with iOS & Android for Mobile, React Native, Angular, NodeJS, MongoDB, PHP, MySQL, Elastic Search and IONIC framework.
Our process includes planning, design, development and testing before launching the applications.
